name: tjbw/silverstripe-idsk-elemental
description: ID-SK Frontend Elemental – Jednotný dizajn manuál elektronických služieb a webových sídiel.

suggest.dnadesign/silverstripe-elemental-virtual: Adds ability for Elemental to share content blocks between pages.
suggest.dnadesign/silverstripe-elemental-userfor: Adds a new element for usersforms.
suggest.dynamic/silverstripe-elemental-blog: Show recent posts from a featured blog.
suggest.silverstripe/elemental-fileblock: A file block for the silverstripe-elemental module.
suggest.dynamic/silverstripe-elemental-embedded-: Embed code like iFrames or Javascript on a page.
